channel.title: Victoria Potapova on Allwellbeing
channel.description: Recent content in Victoria Potapova on Allwellbeing

item.title: How parental behavior affects the future of children
item.description: Each parent imagines success and implementation criteria in their own way. For some, it is important that a child in his adult life could achieve his goals, be active, receive social recognition and a high social status. For some, the main thing is that he is able to unleash the potential inherent in him and enjoy the chosen activity. The scope, boundaries and meanings of “success” depend both on the individuality of a person and on the historical era in which he lives.
